main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed by several Air Force personnel at Rhein-Main Air Base, Germany on 12 April 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright light that appeared to be hovering and then suddenly accelerated and disappeared.
The object was observed visually for about 30 minutes.
The object was oval in shape, approximately 25-30 feet in diameter, and had changing colors of red, green, blue, and white.
The object moved up and down and back and forth at a rapid speed.
There was no radar confirmation of the sighting as the radar was not operating at the time.
